content.rendered:
20 keys to success

Why do so many people struggle through life, while others skip straight to success? Why do some let setbacks stop them, while others power through? It’s clear that people who succeed know what they want, form a detailed plan to get there and achieve their set goals.

With lessons on overcoming fear to finding inspiration, including Robert’s personal stories of profound experiences, Discover Your Treasure is an all-in-one book. It presents life lessons with a down-to-earth approach and a generous dose of humour. If you’re looking for the perfect motivational kick, all you have to do is turn the page.
